-1.title: Can You Hear Me Now?
-1.plot: Best friends Asta and Amanda come to blows over Chase's behavior at the Open Mic night. A fearful Emily goes under the knife to fix her ailing hearing. Asta starts driving lessons with decidedly mixed results. Caylea and D'quan appear on "The Rickey Smiley Morning Show" to plug their new song. And Caylea gets rattled when a surprise caller catches her off guard during the interview.

1.title: Everything's Bigger in Texas
1.plot: In the series premiere, the ladies celebrate Caylea's 21st birthday; Bri and Emily decide whether they should part ways or stay together; Tiffani's boyfriend makes a surprise visit, which upsets some people.

2.title: Dallas, Not Austin
2.plot: Tiffani throws a Texas-style BBQ party to introduce her boyfriend to the group; Bri invites the ladies out to the lake, but drama arises after Tiffani tells Caylea some life-disrupting news.

3.title: Trading Spaces
3.plot: Caylea moves out of Tiffani's house, as Austin moves in; Wooda leaves Bri; Later, Emily finally feels ready to say goodbye to her son that she lost after months of mourning.

4.title: Right to Refuse
4.plot: Amanda is getting ready for her bodybuilding competition, but she is thrown off when she is asked to take a drug test; Tiffani confronts Caylea over a pricey expense; Later, Caylea's football party ends in disaster.

5.title: Friday Night Fights
5.plot: A huge fight breaks out at Caylea's football party; Amanda goes on a date with one of the tallest men in Texas.

6.title: Party Crasher
6.plot: Brichelle attempts to apologize to the group, but the ladies aren't ready to forgive her; Asta's cosplay party gets cut short when Caylea gets a surprise visitor.

7.title: Man Up
7.plot: Tiffani and Austin run into trouble; Asta gets genetic testing so that she can find out what kind of dwarfism she has; Amanda reconnects with an old flame.

8.title: Hello! Goodbye!
8.plot: Emily and Asta argue about their new business venture; After hitting a rough patch, Tiffani breaks up with Austin; Amanda and her ex get serious with each other after reuniting.

9.title: Birthday Blow-out
9.plot: Bri pressures Wooda to define their relationship; Emily decides to open a mini-bar in Dallas without Asta and Ty; tensions rise at Asta's birthday party.

10.title: A New Chapter
10.plot: Asta considers an offer that could launch her art career; Caylea is confronted about her backstabbing behavior; Emily decides that she is ready to have another baby; Tiffani has a health scare.

11.title: Not So Silent Partner
11.plot: Bri is forced to make a tough decision about Meek's health. Emily asks Terra to be her business partner, and Caylea is shocked by her pregnancy test results.

12.title: Dallas Strong
12.plot: Amanda enters her first bodybuilding competition in Dallas; Asta tries to flake on her business deal with Emily; Caylea deals with some big changes; Tiffani gets the surprise of a lifetime.

13.title: Mini-Disaster
13.plot: Asta is under pressure with competing deadlines for her art show and mini bar logo; Emily and Terra butt heads over their vision of the bar; all the girls are shocked to learn about what is going on with Tiffani and Austin.

14.title: Season 1 Reunion
14.plot: The cast of Little Women: Dallas join host Terra Jol for a look back at a wild season in The Lone Star State.

1.title: Girl Code
1.plot: The Season Premiere of Little Women: Dallas finds the ladies divided into two groups following last season's explosive reunion where Caylea accused Amanda of starting a romantic relationship with her ex-boyfriend. Any hope of restoring the fractured friendships is shattered when the ladies all meet up at a nightclub and Caylea and Amanda take the gloves off.

2.title: Unlikely Alliances
2.plot: Amanda bounces back from Caylea's assault and embarks on a dangerous new career. Emily confronts Caylea about disrespecting the memory of her son, leaving Caylea with no allies. And Brichelle emerges as peacemaker, asking everyone to visit a special place where they can "smash each other's faces without smashing each other's faces." Will Caylea show up and face the group?

3.title: A Little BBQ, a Lot of Beef
3.plot: Bri tries to kick start her modeling career with a risqu move! Meanwhile, when Tiffani and Austin seek outside relationship help, Austin loses his cool. And the beef between Caylea, Emily and Amanda gets heated at Dallas's Meat Church.

4.title: Down in the Mud
4.plot: Amanda's new girlfriend sheds light on her relationship with Caylea. Single gals Bri and Brichelle try their luck with a matchmaker and get decidedly mixed results. With her friendship with the Cheeks on the ropes, Caylea strikes out on her own as a host at mudwrestling events. But when she hits a roadblock with her new boss, will Caylea's career be over before it starts?

5.title: Baby Daddy Issues
5.plot: Emily goes into attack mode after she learns that Tiffani has been showing Lontel's mugshot to the rest of the group. When Caylea introduces D'Quan to her dad, but he expresses concern. Tiffani and Austin stress test their relationship at a survival school, where sparks fly. And a sword fight between Emily and Tiffani gets out of hand at the Renaissance Faire.

9.title: Indecent Proposal
9.plot: Just as Amanda's acting career moves forward with her first audition, her friendships with Asta and Caylea fall apart. Bri sets her mind on a career in nursing, but worries she will come up short. And when Caylea throws her boyfriend D'Quan a 21st birthday party, she's the one who gets the surprise of a lifetime.

10.title: Girls Trip
10.plot: Caylea and D'Quan find themselves in engagement limbo, thanks to his disapproving mother. Complications put Emily's IVF procedure and dreams of having another baby at risk. Tiffani is finally ready to be engaged, but will Austin have second thoughts? And when the ladies take a girls' trip to a Dude Ranch, D'Quan shows up unannounced. Will this drama-free getaway become the Wild Wild West?

7.title: Open Mic Fight
7.plot: When Amanda makes a startling admission, it leaves the ladies with mixed emotions. Emily is rushed to the doctor for a medical emergency. And when a huge opportunity comes her way, Caylea's music career could be on a fast-track...as long as old drama doesn't derail it.

imdb.title: Little Women: Dallas
plot: Another spinoff of The Little Women franchise. This one is about the lives of Little Women living in Dallas, Texas.::bohunkchicklet
